name: ManualIntervention
description: Pause deployment and wait for manual intervention
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: instructions
inputs.label: Instructions
inputs.helpMarkDown: These instructions will be shown to the user for resuming or rejecting the manual intervention. Based on these instructions the user will take an informed decision about this manual intervention.

inputs.name: emailRecipients
inputs.label: Notify users
inputs.helpMarkDown: Send a manual intervention pending email to specific users (or groups). Only users with manage deployment permission can act on a manual intervention.

inputs.name: onTimeout
inputs.label: On timeout
inputs.helpMarkDown: Reject or resume this manual intervention automatically after it is pending for the specified timeout or 60 days, whichever is earlier.
